          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3c41230784bcd583d9dcfbfaaad4e0d947e5f7dd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The melting point of solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Schmelzpunkt der Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le point de fusion des solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ponto de derretimento dos sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il punto di fusione dei solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σημείο τήξης των στερεών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El punto de fusión de sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustrations shows that ice and gold melts at temperatures higher than 0 and 1064 degrees Celsius, respectively.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigt Abbildungen daß Eis- und 
Goldschmelzen an den CelsiusGrad der Temperaturen stark als 0 und 
1064, beziehungsweise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce les illustrations prouve que des fontes de 
glace et d'or aux degrés des températures plus haut que 0 et 1064 
Celsius, respectivement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as ilustrações mostram que derretimentos do
gelo e do ouro nos graus das temperaturas mais altamente de 0 e 1064 
Célsio, respectivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le illustrazioni indica che fusioni 
dell'oro e del ghiaccio ai gradi di temperature più superiore 0 e 
1064 centigradi, rispettivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις δείχνουν ότι ο πάγος και ο 
χρυσός λειώνουν στις θερμοκρασίες υψηλότερες από 0 και 1064
βαθμούς Κελσίου, αντίστοιχα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este las ilustraciones muestran que los 
derretimientos del hielo y del oro en los grados de las temperaturas 
más arriba de 0 y 1064 centígrados, respectivamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
